translation.registrationSuccessful: You've been registered and logged in successfully.
translation.createNewGameNotLoggedIn: You need to be logged in to create a new game
translation.waitingForPlayerHeading_one: You are waiting for <0>{{player}}</0> to make their move
translation.waitingForPlayerHeading_other: You are waiting for <0>{{player}}</0> to make their move
translation.youGuessHeading: Finally, its your turn to guess!
translation.youInterceptHeading: You can now step in and make another guess, but be aware, it'll cost you one token!
translation.otherInterceptHeading: You can now make another guess for <0>{{player}}</0>
translation.confirmHeading: You now need to confirm if <0>{{player}}</0> guessed title and artist of the song correctly. Be fair!
translation.confirmText: Did <0>{{player}}</0> guess artist and title correctly?
translation.guessText: Where do you think this hit belongs?
translation.cannotSubmitGuess: You cannot submit a guess right now
translation.name: Name
translation.startGameNotEnoughPlayers: At least two players must be part of a game
translation.creator: creator
translation.title: Title
translation.hitNoGameRunning: No game is currently running, so no hit for you!
translation.hitUnknown: The hit is currently unknown, you'll have to wait for it to be revealed.
translation.hitRevealed: <0>{{player}}</0> is right! This is <1>{{title}}</1> by <2>{{artist}}</2> from <3>{{year}}</3>. This song belongs to the <4>{{pack}}</4> pack. You can now play it at full length.
translation.hitRevealedBelonging: <0>{{player}}</0> is right! This is <1>{{title}}</1> by <2>{{artist}}</2> from <3>{{year}}</3>. You might know this song from <4>{{belongs_to}}</4> and it belongs to the <4>{{pack}}</4> pack. You can now play it at full length.
translation.skipHit: Skip this hit by paying one token
translation.skipHitNotLoggedIn: You are not logged in and cannot skip a hit
translation.skipHitNotGuessing: Only the guessing player can skip a hit
translation.skipHitNoToken: You need to pay a token to skip a hit
translation.cannotSkipHit: You cannot skip a hit right now
translation.otherWins: {{player}} is the winner of this game!
translation.finalScore: And here are the final results:
translation.gameSettingsHitGoal: How many hits do the players need to guess correctly in order to win?
translation.gameSettingsStartTokens: How many tokens should every player get when starting a game?
translation.gameSettingsHitDuration: How many seconds of a hit will every player hear when guessing?
translation.gameSettingsRememberHits: Should hits be remembered across games to prevent duplicates for as long as possible?
translation.gameSettingsNotOpen: The game needs to be stopped to change its settings
translation.gameSettingsPacks: Check all the packs you want to use in this game:
translation.addPlayerNotLocalGame: You can only add local players in a local game
translation.addPlayerNotWaiting: You can only add local players while the game is stopped
translation.welcomeText: Welcome to the unofficial Hitster online card game! Here you will try to guess when a certain song was released, but don't worry, its not as hard as it sounds. Read on to find out what its all about.
translation.packsFeature: a total of {{hits}} hits in {{packs}} packs available for you to guess
translation.accessibilityFeature: developed with screen reader accessibility in mind, so that sighted and visually impaired people can play together
translation.publicAndPrivateGamesFeature: play a public game to play with everyone who's currently available, or play a private game for just you and your friends
translation.localGamesFeature: play a local game with friends and family, just like the card game, but you don't need to have the cards around
translation.noRegistrationFeature: no registration necessary, just create a game and play
translation.cardCorrectionFeature: the original card game contains some tiny mistakes on the cards, but we fix them immediately
translation.ownedBy: This unofficial version is based on the original Hitster card game which is owned by <0>Koninklijke Jumbo B.V.</0>.
translation.issue: For bug reports and general feedback please open a <0>GitHub issue</0>.
